# “İğrenç Espriler” - Privacy Policy

## Overview

This Privacy Policy describes the information collected by Edimly İnternet
Teknolojileri (‘we’,’us’, ‘our’) through our mobile applications, website and
related services and how we use that information.

### We Don’t Collect Any Personal Information with Our Applications

When you download and use our mobile applications, we don’t require you to
provide any information and we don’t collect any information about you or your
device.

In other words, we do not collect information such as your full name,
address, phone number or email address.

### We Don’t Collect Information of Children

Our website and mobile applications comply with the Children’s Online Privacy
Protection Act.

We don’t knowingly collect personal information from children
under the age of 13, and if in the event that a user identifies himself or
herself as a child under the age of 13 through a support request, we will not
collect, store or use, and will delete in a secure manner, any personal
information of such user.

### Location Information

We do not use or collect your precise geographic location.

## Analytics

We collect some anonymous usage information to help us improve our apps.

We
use third party analytics services (Google Analytics, Firebase) that may
collect data as a device type and OS, an app identifier, unique device
identifiers, app session time, events and lengths.

Google utilizes the Data collected to track and examine the use of this
Application, to prepare reports on its activities and share them with other
Google services.

Google may use the Data collected to contextualize and personalize the ads of
its own advertising network.
Analytics collected: Cookie and Usage data.

Personal Data
collected: various types of Data as specified in the privacy policy of the
service.

### AdMob (AdMob Google Inc.)

AdMob is an advertising service provided by AdMob Google Inc.

AdMob collected: Cookie and Usage data.

If you submit a support request, we may receive your email
address and other information you provide related to your support request.

Use of information we
collect is subject to the Privacy Policy in effect at the time such
information is collected.
sharing:
Google utilizes the Data collected to track and examine the use of this

Google services.

We use Support Information only to provide support to you and we do not share
